SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
All right, Ameya.
Let's go over this one more time.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh, come on, LoLo.
Don't you trust me?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
This is your final exam of the Witchterms.
If you fail, your turn will not come back
around for another five years.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text: You're right. People in this world toss around words like 'magic' and 'witch' as though they're everyday things, yet no one actually believes in magic. I find it all quite odd.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Which is why this is the perfect place to
collect mana! I mean, it's overflowing
with magical power that no one uses?
I'm the luckiest girl alive!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Do you truly believe you were sent to
this world simply due to good fortune?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.text: What is there except good fortune? Besides, I'm always super lucky.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh hey, I gotta go.
Can't start off late!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_09.text:
For all these many years I've been your familiar,
you've always overcome your trials with luck.
But hear me, Ameya: this is the one thing you
cannot overcome through chance alone.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text:
We have a new friend joining us today, class.
Why don't you introduce yourself?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hi! I'm Yumeha Izumi, and I'm from the east
coast. When I grow up, I wanna be a totally
amazing witch!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text: ...Oopsies! Did I say that out loud?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text:
A witch? Cripes, kids from
out east are so dang strange.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text: She's a real dum-dum, all right.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_CLASSROOM_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, it's important to have
a dream! Ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text:
Man, why did I say I wanna be a witch?
Now all the kids are gonna think I'm
just some huge weirdo.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text:
Still, I suppose my job will be easier 
if I end up making a big impression.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text:
You are Ameya Aisling, yes?
A witch of Pulchra?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text:
Merely a man who will be stealing
your magic. Now hold still, girl!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text:
Jerk! I'll show you what a
witch of Pulchra can do!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_000_.text: Ah, but you are not yet a witch.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_001_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_001_.text:
You are immature, as I thought—
but I suppose this magic will do.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Y-yeah, LoLo. I am. I just...
Wait, no I'm not! Where's my magic!?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Macha
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
I fear that strange man sapped nearly all
of your ability. All I could manage was to
prevent him from taking you as well.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Look, I appreciate you saving me
and all, but who even ARE you?
Also, what did you mean by—

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Macha
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Soft, child. With the power you have left, conversing
with your familiar is the most you can manage.
I shall share with you a small amount of my own magic.
Consider it my gift to you.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
I... I can feel it returning.
Thank you very much.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Macha
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
You have a modicum of power and one spell
remaining to you, and must use it to reclaim the
magic you have lost. This should prove enough for
you to set off and find your power on your own.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Macha
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
I am Macha, Goddess of Sorcery. There are many
actors attempting to throw off the balance of magic
among the Conjoined Worlds, including the man
you just met. Sadly, I know not who he is.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Macha
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Now go forth and fight on my behalf
as you look to regain your powers.
Do this for the sake of all magic!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
And having said her piece, she departs.
Yet I wonder if we should accept her
words at face value, for I have never
heard of a 'Macha, Goddess of Sorcery.'

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Right, but she also saved me AND
gave me a spell to help find my magic!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Take care, Ameya, for it goes against all the
laws of sorcery for a witch of Pulchra to use
otherworldly magic. Also, I thought you witches
did not acknowledge the existence of gods?

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Yeah, I know—but right now, I don't have
any other choice. I mean, I can't finish my
Witchterms without magic, and I can't
even get back to Pulchra either.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Very well, Ameya. I ask only that you cast
this new spell where I cannot see it.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_WAYTOHOME_000_CUT_010_.text:
Cease that at once! You know I've been
sensitive there since we arrived!

SUB_W01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
So I guess I'll find some of my magic
at the end of this green line?

SUB_W01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
It seems this Macha character left you a
form of searching magic. Only you can see
these lines, Ameya. Follow them carefully.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is no ordinary cat, Ameya.
It is a magical animal that serves
as a manifestation of your powers.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Really? Wow! Er, but why did my
magic take the form of a cat?
Is it copying you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am a hundred times more elegant
than that flea-bitten feline! Ahem! I mean, if I had to guess,
I think your magic has simply taken
on a form that suits this world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So I get to collect kitties?
Okay, now I'm getting excited.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And before you say anything, LoLo,
I'm well aware this isn't a game.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
But just look how ADORABLE she is!
Aw, what a cute widdle thing!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Do you know how many
you must collect?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FIRSTCAT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Not a clue—so for now, I'll concentrate
on getting enough of my power back that
I can start gathering mana.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.text:
This is no ordinary cat, Ameya.
It is a magical animal that serves
as a manifestation of your powers.

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: UI
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Ameya, a witch-in-training from Pulchra, came to
Miyako City for her Witchterms, but her magic took
the form of cats and scattered across the worlds.
This is no time to think about tests, Ameya!

SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: UI
SUB_W01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_06.text: Let's review how we got here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.text:
I believe you've regained the
bare minimum of your power.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I have just enough to show
the kids how amazing magic can be.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE0_000_CUT_000_.text:
Then you should begin collecting mana.
That was your objective, after all.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE1_000_CUT_000_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE1_000_CUT_000_.text:
While it's important to collect cats
and restore your powers, you won't
be able to return to Pulchra if you
don't continue collecting mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE1_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_CATSTAGE1_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I suppose I need to find a
balance between those things, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MANASTAGE1_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MANASTAGE1_000_CUT_000.text:
While it's important to collect cats
and restore your powers, you won't
be able to return to Pulchra if you
don't continue collecting mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MANASTAGE1_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MANASTAGE1_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I suppose I need to find a
balance between those things, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Ugh! I hate time, and I hate
being woken up by a machine!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_001.text:
A life of such discipline is the
perfect training for you, Ameya.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I am a squire sent from Pulchra. I call
myself Shinobu Kato, and it is my sacred
duty to both serve and protect you. I am deeply sorry I was unable to reach
you in time before your first hardship.
That said, I am uncertain if I should
report this to Pulchra, or if—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Look, I'm in a hurry right now,
so can we please get on with it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
It is your job to protect witch candidates,
squire. What were you doing while Ameya
was in such terrible danger?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
You must be an ancient familiar indeed
to be able to converse with a squire! That said, I do not appreciate your tone.
I am a squire, and I intend to serve your
mistress to the best of my abilities.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_SQUIRE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Then do your job, unless you wish me
to report your failures to Pulchra!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there, Kentaro. You hear about
the walking puppet, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure did, guy! I hear it stomps around
going 'kshunk kshunk,' which just
sounds scary as all get-out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A walking puppet? Hmm! This seems like
a good time to show 'em some magic!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hey, what're you talking about?
Share with me if it's fun, 'kay?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_050.text:
You into ghosts and stuff there?
If so, you wanna come with us
to see the walking puppet?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Whaaaaaat!? Oh man, I didn't know
we were gonna LOOK at it!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You're coming, yeah? I mean, you still
need to learn about the city, so...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Not sure what a walking puppet and the city
have to do with each other, but it sounds
like a ton of fun anyway, so sign me up!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Well, heck. If Yumeha's going,
I guess I will too.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Swell! If anyone asks, we'll just
say study hall ran late, eh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Criminy, the walking puppet's
really here! So lucky!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, shucks! I was going to rattle one of the
trash cans to spook 'em, but the thing's
actually walking! What should I do!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Kentaro's not home yet? Well heck, what's he
doing out so late? Sure hope the poor fella
didn't get kidnapped or nothin'.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_030.text:
I am Ameya the Witch! I used my
magical powers to stop the puppet,
so you should all be safe now!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_010_050.text: It didn't stop? Oh wow, my magic really has weakened... Er, but never mind that! Time to chase a puppet!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_000.text:
No way in heck that puppet's gonna
follow us into the warehouse.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_010.text:
But Ren, Yumeha's gone! We lost
her while we were runnin' away!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_020.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_020.text:
Are you for real!? Look, you can't
let the puppet find you, yeah?
Just stay hidden.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_040.text:
Hold it right there, you!
I know you're scheming something,
and I'm not gonna let you scheme it!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_050.text:
Hm? I sense someone hiding.
Must be Ren and Kentaro.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_060.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_060.text: Lady Ameya, I am Squire 15413837, known as Shinobu Kato in this world. The being standing before you is known as a kugutsu. It is a type of automaton— one which will prove difficult to stop.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_070.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_070.text:
But I need to show off my witch powers
so I can collect mana!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_080.speaker: Macha_Copy
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_011_080.text:
Worry not, child. The goddess Macha
has come to lend you her aid.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_000.text:
In the name of Ameya the Witch,
I order you to stop!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_020.text: Did she just say she's a witch?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Gosh, just look at her...
She's so cool...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_040.text:
And now, I bid you farewell! ...C'mon, that's it. Show's over.
Get on home already.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Oh heck, my dad's gonna be
real steamed at me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_060.text: Izumi? Where'd you run off to?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_070.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_070.text:
I didn't run anywhere! I was just sitting
here all by myself scared as anything,
and all because the two of you are terrible!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Gosh, I'm real sorry about that. But hey,
while you were hiding, one of those
witches you like so much showed up!
Sure wish you'd been here to see it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_090.text:
Oh! Hello there, kitty.
What are you doing here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_010_CUT_020_100.text:
You probably got a cat at home, yeah?
Heh. I bet you'd be real surprised
how weird our pets are.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_000.text:
That was tougher than I thought.
I'm worried about what comes next!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_010.text:
I'd say it was well done for a first time—
especially considering that you're lacking
a great many of your powers.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Not sure if hearing that from my
familiar is very encouraging,
but it DOES make me happy! So don't worry, LoLo! I'll keep doing
everything I can, because the last
thing I want to do is disappoint you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_030.text:
And yet, you keep picking up these
odd strays. What are you intending
to do with this one here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KUGUTU_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I could use a little more firepower on
my side, so I suppose I'll have it fight with me.
How's that sound to you, big guy?

SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.text:
Rakuto Station is close to Sequoia Mall,
and Rakunan Station is close to Keihoku
Elementary School. Where should I go?

SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUNANSTA_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUNANSTA_000_CUT_000.text:
Rakuhoku Station is close to Miyako Imperial
University, and Rakuto Station is close to
Sequoia Mall. Where should I go?

SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_LTXT_AMYA_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.text:
Rakuhoku Station is close to Miyako Imperial
University, and Rakunan Station is close to
Keihoku Elementary School. Where should I go?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There's a huge frog at the pond,
Haruna! Wanna go see?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Why would I want to go see a frog?
You just go do your kiddy things with
your kiddy friends and leave me alone.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_020.text: Geez, she must really hate frogs.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hey there, Izumi! You ever seen
a big frog out east, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_040.text: Sure I have! My friend's familiar— I mean, her family keeps one as a pet!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_050.text:
A pet? Nope. You don't get it. Well, that settles it: I'm takin' you
to the pond after school! Uh, but you
don't hate frogs or nothing, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh no. In fact, I LOVE frogs!
But they're not really all that
special, so why are we going
out of our way to see one?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Just trust me.
It's gonna be worth it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, heck. There's some
weird-lookin' guy here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Hello there, chums! Have you
come to see the frog as well?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_030.text:
My business is that frog, young man!
I want to see it with my own two eyes.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Holy cow, Ren! Look at the
size of that frog there!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_060.text:
What the hey? Why's it doing that!?
What's wrong with the thing?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it seems to have taken quite the
liking to us! Er, and it also seems to
have something dangerous with—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_080.text:
Jeepers, this is bad! We're gettin'
out of here, Izumi! ...Izumi?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_090.text: And the old man's gone too!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_100.text:
I, Ameya the Witch, command you to
stand down! Do not attack this boy!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Holy moly, it stopped!
Ugh, but now it's goin' again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_000_120.text:
Okay, seriously!? Well, whatever.
If you won't listen, I'll just have to
beat some sense into you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Phew! Okay, that should be it. Also,
you kids really need to start going
straight home after school, so be
good and get outta here already!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Heck, that was the witch lady again!
...Oh. I get it now.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_030.text:
Are you okay, Ren? Are you hurt?
You didn't run, so I didn't know
what the heck was gonna happen!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_040.text:
No need to worry! That witch lady saved me.
Boy, can't believe you missed another chance
to see her in action.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Aw, don't worry about it.
You'll see her next time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_070.text:
Now where'd that old
fella get off to?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_080.text:
Oh, I thought he was with you!
He was a weird one, boy howdy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_010_CUT_010_090.text:
Whoa. You think the old man was
that cat in disguise, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_000.text:
I see you successfully
collected more mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Say, LoLo? Do you think Ren
knows what I really am?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Even if he does, it will not be a problem,
for no one will believe him. I doubt it
will prove a hindrance to your objectives.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure, but it'll make life at school way more
difficult. I mean, he can be a pretty forceful
kid when he wants to be.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_040.text:
If the worst comes to pass, the squire will
help you. While he cannot use magic, he has
been equipped with all manner of tools.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_050.text:
You mean he'd, like, erase Ren's
memory or something?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_060.text:
You mustn't worry about that.
Passing the Witchterms should
be your only goal here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_FLOG_020_CUT_000_070.text: I know, but I'm still worried.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
This is a portal to the Conjoined Worlds.
Did the line truly lead you here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah. There's probably a cat hiding
somewhere in this building.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
I have a terrible feeling about this—
my poor fur is standing on end.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
The green line goes past this stone door.
I guess that means I should go through it,
right, LoLo?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
I would assume so. Does that foul
sham of a goddess really intend on
taking you to the outside?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Macha_Copy
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text: I'm the sham of a goddess, cat! The other goddess was the real one, which means this line is also real.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Your continued insistence on appearing
without being summoned is only making
this more complicated.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text:
The goddess's magic always showed me the
right path, which is why I want to believe
her this time. I mean, I can trust her,
right, LoLo? ...Right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose so—although I have never heard of a witch leaving her assigned world in the midst of her Witchterms, so let this be the only time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.text: Now, see here! Again!? I thought the last time you left this world was supposed to be the only time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.text:
Well, sure—but I just KNOW
one of my magic cats is in here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.text:
You know nothing of the sort!
You were simply lucky last time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.text:
*sigh* But I suppose those words fall on
deaf ears—and since your mind is decided
and I am your familiar, I will go along
with your decisions. Oh, bother. Why, oh why,
must this be happening again...?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_010_CUT_000.text: Quit grumbling and let's go, LoLo!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.text:
This must be a part of your Witchterms.
Yes. That's it. There can be no other
possible explanation for—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.text:
Are you hungry or something, LoLo?
I've never heard you so grumpy!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_020_CUT_000.text:
And whose fault do you
think that is, hmm!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.text:
Fie, but what world awaits us next!?
Any who try to hurt you will be met
with my unending wrath!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.text:
Is something wrong, LoLo?
You suddenly seem super
enthusiastic about this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_OUTSIDECAT_030_CUT_000.text:
This is not enthusiasm!
This is DESPAIR!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_000.text:
All that for one magic cat?
That was hardly worth the effort.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_010.text:
But I got a little more mana,
so all's well that ends well!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, the Crystal Cage seems normal,
which is a relief. It means this mana
counts towards your exam.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_040.text:
So what happens if you DO cheat?
I mean, hypothetically.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_050.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_050.text:
The Crystal Cage turns red, and the accused
will immediately be pulled back to Pulchra.
She will be brought to trial, stripped of her
magic, and forced to assume the role of squire.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_060.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, wowzers! So I guess what I
did was super risky then, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_070.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_070.text:
It most certainly was—and I suggest you
start thinking for longer than a nanosecond
before you act, because whatever you do
will affect me as well.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_080.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_080.text:
Okay, I get it... But you know what? I had no idea
there were places in the Conjoined Worlds that
are so different from Pulchra and Miyako City,
and I kinda want to see what they're like, too!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_090.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_512_CUT_000_090.text: Yes, that would be rather... Wait, no! Don't do it, Ameya!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_012_CUT_000_000.text: I'm glad you found your cat.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Me too. Er, but what did I go there to do, anyway?
I can't even remember the place's name.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_000.text: I'm glad you found your cat.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_010.text:
I wonder what happened to Alexandre
after that? And to all of those poor
frozen people?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_020.text:
The fate of those worlds lies in
the hands of those who live there.
You mustn't interfere overmuch.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_112_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, I guess I just went to look
for a cat, not save an entire world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_212_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_212_CUT_000_010.text:
*yaaawn* Yeah, I'm exhausted.
I'm just gonna go sack out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_212_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_212_CUT_000_030.text:
Why are you asking me this NOW, LoLo?
Look, I'll wake up early and do it first
thing tomorrow, okay? I swear.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_312_CUT_000_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_312_CUT_000_020.text:
That's because there was nothing there.
I doubt it will count as cheating, but...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_312_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_312_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, good! The Crystal Cage is normal,
which means it indeed did not count
as cheating. What a relief.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_000.text:
That world was filled
with stagnated magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Ugh, I know. I feel disgusting.
It's like there's some dark power
clinging to me...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_020.text:
I DEFINITELY need a shower.
Byeee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_003_CUT_000_030.text:
Showers. Blech. Another of the
worst customs of this world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I wonder what Deus Maris actually is.
I mean, it didn't feel like a fiend or
a spirit or anything like that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anything can be a god so long
as someone labels it so.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_020.text:
I mean, sure. But it definitely had
some kind of special power.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_030.text: At least it did not declare itself to be a god—unlike a certain 'Goddess of Sorcery' we know.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_004_CUT_000_040.text:
Wow, LoLo. You REALLY don't
trust Macha, do you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_006_CUT_000_000.text:
Blech. The bottoms of my paws still
feel disgusting. You likely don't
understand since you wear shoes.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Poor LoLo. Did your little toe beans
get burned from all the acid?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_000.text:
I guess the people living there
didn't know anything about the
cycle of spirits either, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_010.text:
I would posit that they are
simply thickheaded.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_020.text:
Do you think it's because they live in that
place that they lose the ability to see them?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_007_CUT_000_030.text:
All I know is that we cannot let
that happen to you. All of your
senses must remain keen.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_000.text:
So did the Lord of the Earth
make those holes then?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_010.text:
I can't say I'm particularly interested
one way or the other, so I kindly ask 
that you not bother me with such.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_020.text:
Gee, LoLo. Are you even
interested in anything at all?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_008_CUT_000_040.text: I don't believe that for one second.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_000.text:
Ugh, I'm soooooo tired of riding stuff!
That would've been so much better if we
could've just gotten it done with magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_010.text:
You must obey the rules of each world
if you hope to pass your Witchterms.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_020.text:
Yeah, but that's why I'm going to Keihoku!
I'm a very good elementary-school student,
if you didn't know.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, even if this is ultimately all a fun
bit of pretend, I still think you could
stand to study a bit harder.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_009_CUT_000_040.text:
Witches don't need weird educational input.
Also, biased thinking means I won't be able
to cast magic as freely as I need to.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
There really weren't a lot of spirits there, huh?
Next time, I wanna go somewhere that's
BURSTING with spirit power!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Your Witchterms are taking place here.
In Miyako City. You would do well
to remember that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_000.text:
Boy, that really made me think... Er, but I'm
not sure why? Maybe because I'm realizing
there are all kinds of paths out there
besides the witch life.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Indeed. But as you are of Pulchra,
it is the witch's life for you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_011_CUT_000_030.text:
I hope you can retain that
enthusiasm after the Calamity.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_000.text:
Ahhh, I feel so alive now!
Glad to be back in Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_010.text:
As am I. Indeed, the fact my paws
do not burn is a pleasant feeling.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_020.text:
Are you sure your paws don't
burn because of Pandora?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_030.text:
What!? Is there sand in them!?
Remove it at once, Ameya!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_013_CUT_000_040.text:
Sure thing, LoLo!
Let's get you in the tub.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_000.text: Were those triangles some kinda magic?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_010.text:
If control over power can be considered magic,
then I suppose it must qualify. That said,
it seems to follow an entirely different set
of laws than the magic in Pulchra.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_020.text: I just don't get technology and junk. It's like, do I really even need any of that?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_015_CUT_000_030.text: Of course not. You're a witch.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_000.text:
...I'm alive, right? Whew! How did I manage
to get to that world—and were the warriors
over there actually dead?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_010.text:
There were distorted powers in play
in that place; I am glad we did not
tarry there overlong.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_020.text:
Man, there are so many mysteries in the
Conjoined Worlds. And no matter how hard
I think, I can't seem to solve them.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_017_CUT_000_030.text: Best not think of them at all, then.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_000.text:
Was that city a part of the same
world as Miyako City?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_010.text:
I would posit as much. It did not seem to be
an alternate version of this world, at any rate.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_020.text:
...You ever think that we're one wrong move
away from accidentally causing the law of
causality to collapse, wiping out the entirety
of the Conjoined Worlds in an instant?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_018_CUT_000_030.text:
The fact they're still here means
they are surprisingly durable.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh man, I was practically DROWNING
in spirit power there! Er, but the
good kind of drowning, you know?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_010.text:
It was also quite peaceful without
so many noisy humans about.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_020.text: Not a fan of humans, LoLo?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_019_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm simply not fond of them wandering
up and petting me without so much
as a by-your-leave.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
We really gonna wait here
until it moves, then?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Sure are, bud! Gotta see it for ourselves.
The grownups say the cars on the street 
make 'em move, but that seems like a
buncha malarkey to me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Eek! Dang, Yumeha! It's not nice
to spook a fella like that!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Kentaro, you're just a
big ol' scaredy cat! You came at the perfect time there, Izumi:
We're watching this haunted swing to
see if it moves on its own.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, so you think there's an actual
ghost on it? You sure it's not just
the wind or something?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
That's what we're gonna find out.
I've never seen it myself, but all
the folks at school know about it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Holy geez... Th-the swing's MOVIN'!
What if it's really a g-g-g—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Calm down, fella! Sure, it's moving,
but there's no one around.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
No, wait! Look!
Something's on the swing!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
What in the hey? You're right!
I dunno what it is, but it's dark
and shadowy as anything.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
It's lookin' right at us!
Oh heckin' cripes, I know it is!
AAAAAAAAAAAAH!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
So we've got a monster that likes scaring
little kids, huh!? Well, you better watch it,
because I, Ameya the Witch, will...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, are you IGNORING me!? Because the
witches of Pulchra will NOT be ignored!
You're gonna pay for that!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
I guess that fiend wasn't actually
ignoring me at all—it was just one
that only targeted kids.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
...Okay, what? You're staring at me.
Why? What? What's going on here? Look, I hate being ignored, but I'm not
wild about being stared at, either.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Sorry. It's just that I went and
messed everything up again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
...Nothing. I swear, Izumi has seriously
awful timing—and so do you, witch lady!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, I don't get what's going on,
but be careful going home. Byeee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Would it kill her to stick around
for a little while?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Hey! Why did you run
ahead of me, Kentaro!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
I... I'm so sorry, Yumeha! But Ren,
why didn't YOU run? You're so dang
brave, and I'm just...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Boy howdy, you guys really missed
out getting all scared like that.
You shoulda come back faster.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text: Ren sure is a weird one.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Hm? Got a cat at your
feet there, Yumeha.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, so I do! Aw, it's so nice
when they come to you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text:
That mana from earlier counted, which
means Ren didn't find out who I was.
Honestly, I think he was just trying
to have me meet the witch.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text:
He's a good lad, that one—even if
such a thing will never come to pass.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text: Yeah, I feel sorta bad for him.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text:
I don't. If anything, I think that boy's
having the time of his life.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text:
You sound like Mom when
you say stuff like that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_GHOSTSWING_010_CUT_000.text:
I'm so excited to see how my little
girl finishes out her Witchterms.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh wow, this must be a girls' school.
It reminds me of Pulchra... *sniff*
Man! I miss everyone so much!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
...Okay, Ameya, get a grip!
You're here to find a cat! I'm sure glad this isn't an all-boys school;
it would've been hard to just let myself
into the place in that case.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heckin' cripes, it's a snake!
No, a basilisk!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Golly, Sophia, keep your head on there!
That snake there's not thinking about
anything but the frog, eh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text: How the heck am I supposed to be calm, Tomoko!? You know you'll get turned into stone like that poor frog there if you let a basilisk bite you! Also, what are basilisks even doing in Miyako!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, gosh. I don't think I'd be strong enough
to manage a snake that can turn folks to stone.
I'd have to go get Tsunano—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text: Never fear! Ameya the Witch is here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
A witch!? Aw, nuts! She's gonna curse me!
Basilisk on one side and a witch on the other?
I'm gonna die here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh man, now she's even MORE panicked.
What should I do?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
...A witch? Now just hold on a sec!
You making a little movie there, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Why do the people in this world
absolutely REFUSE to accept reality?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Nope! I'm a witch, and I'm gonna
seal this snake away...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Wow Miss Witch! That was swell!
I mean, your magic was just incredible!
Isn't that right, Sophia?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Oh gosh, I'm just so thankful!
You saved my life!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Okay, why do they sound so exaggerated
and sarcastic? Also, they're DEFINITELY
getting the wrong idea here...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text: Well, that's it from me! Farewell!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
She really must've been filming something, huh?
Good, 'cause the way you were screaming to beat
the band at the beginning there is gonna look
GREAT on film!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
But I was honestly just thankful, Tomoko!
I really thought I was gonna be turned
into some kind of statue!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Aww, a kitty! Get over here
and heal my wounded soul!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Kitty cat, no! Wait! Oh, I'm sorry, you two.
My cat can be a little...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Oh, it's okay! She was just healing
my deep emotional scars.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_1.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_010_1.text:
But it's not gonna end well for your cat
if security finds her, so best get her
wrangled and scoot on outta here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Do you think they understood
that I'm a real witch?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Well, there's more mana now, so I suppose
some small part of them believed in magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Phew! That's good. Still, I didn't think
I'd find a basilisk in this world!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Neither did I. But those girls had at least a
base knowledge of the creature, which makes
me think they appear in the myths and faerie
tales of this world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Still, when things that shouldn't exist
start appearing, that means something's
going wrong somewhere in the world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Which, I must again remind you,
is not your problem to solve. If anything, think of this as a chance to
show off a witch's powers. Save these people
from danger using your magic. Easy, no?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
Oh yeah, that's one way to do it!
Like all of a sudden, Ameya the Witch
of Justice appears on the scene!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_020_0.text:
You do get quite carried away
with the smallest of ideas.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Aw, I didn't know you were
learning the piano, Kotoha!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, you betcha! I wanna be a
piano teacher when I grow up.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, I bet you'll be a great one.
You were playing at lunch in the
music room the other day, right?
You were really good!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_030.text:
There's still some recess time left.
Do you want to try playing?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
The heck!? That stuffed bird from
the cooking classroom is chasing her!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Help me, Kotoha! This piece
of taxidermy is chasing me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_000_160.text:
That was close! But I am Ameya the Witch,
and I'm here now, so we're all right! You there! Fell bird! I won't let you
harm this girl! Now ready yourself!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Cripes, whose idea of
a bad joke is this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_010.text:
That taxidermy bird housed a spirit
that made it move. Did any of you
do something to it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Don't look at me now! I just peeled this
label off and the dang thing came to life!
Real mean trick, if you ask me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Huh. Well, I guess that's not your fault.
But the busted-up bird is just an object,
which means I can fix it...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_040.text:
And there we go! Oh, but it isn't a trick—
it's real honest-to-goodness magic.
But it won't move on its own again,
so don't worry. Anyway, byeee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Gosh, I guess I see why Yumeha
wants to be a witch now...
Oh, but where'd she go!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Real sorry about that, everybody!
I went looking for a teacher and
lost a lot of time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_070.text: Haruna! Kotoha! Are you all right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Yes, Ms. Erisawa, we're fine.
But this bird, um...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Hmmm? Wait, this is the bird from the
cooking classroom! How did it get here?
I'll just put this back where it belongs.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_100.text:
Guess Ms. Erisawa doesn't know it
was flying around by itself, maybe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Nope. And I knew she'd think I'd lost my
marbles if I told her it was, so I just said
you were being chased by a really big bird.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_120.text:
...A really big bird?
How old are you? Five?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh! Hello there, kitty!
Where have you been?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_000.text:
LoLo, guess what! I managed to save
a classmate from danger at the absolute
PERFECT moment today!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_010.text:
It seems you fully intend to play
the role of the Witch of Justice. That said, you managed to show off your
powers without thinking too hard about it,
just as I said—and of course, the mana
counts all the same.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Yeah, but Haruna doesn't really
seem to believe in witches...
Oh, but Kotoha did, though!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_030.text:
Those sorts of children tend to be
the biggest dreamers once something
happens to overturn their prejudices.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_040.text:
Really? I feel like she's the queen bee
and everyone always kinda keeps their
heads down around her. And if I manage to convince her, I bet
it'll change the vibe of the whole class!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_050.text:
You will need a strategy, Ameya.
Think very carefully about this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_060.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_BIRD_000_CUT_020_060.text:
I know, I know. This is all
part of my Witchterms.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So the green line is
pointing...there!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aw! It ran away. I must've scared the
poor thing when I started yelling.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Whatcha doin' here?
You lose something, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh, sorry. I wasn't really
looking where I was—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah no, don't sweat it. You can enter the
university campus, no problem—I only asked
'cause it looked like you were in trouble.
Anything a guy can do to help?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Actually, I'm looking for my cat.
I just saw her, but she ran off again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Missing critter, eh? You happen
to know which way she ran?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_000_CUT_000_0.text:
East, eh? Wonder if it went
over to Sangen-in Temple.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text: I bet that kitty went in here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Stop! Don't go in the limestone caves!
You got a death wish or something!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
But my cat's in there! And if it's
dangerous, that's all the more
reason to go in and save her!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Listen, I'll find your missing cat.
You just stand there and don't even
THINK about following me, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, crud. I just leapt into this thing,
and now I'm in a real heap of trouble.
Wish I had called up Tsunanori for help.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Welp, I got no service here—and if I come
back empty-handed, that kid's gonna insist
on comin' in after me. What's a fella to do?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Leave it to Ameya the Witch, of course!
The girl outside told me everything about
the brave young man who went into the
limestone caverns all alone!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Brave? Yeah no. I just
wasn't thinking, is all.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
But bravery isn't enough to find a cat.
We'll have to do it...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Behold, the cat is over there!
Er, but it seems to have company.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_010_0.text:
And there you have it!
Er, so are you hurt?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_010_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_010_0.text:
Thought you were pulling my leg when you said
you were a witch, but you're the real deal.
Still, if folks like Tsunanori exist, I guess
there's no reason not to have witches, too.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Okay, that should be all of them.
I think we're safe now.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Yeah, but what about the cat? If we don't
take it to that girl, she's for sure gonna
come crawling in here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
I have it right here, so I'll leave
that to you. As for me, I'm out!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Interestin' lady, that one.
I kinda feel like she cast
some kinda spell on me...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Sure am—and I found your cat.
Uh, but where'd the lady go?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
You didn't see a gal swing by here?
Nobody callin' herself Ameya the Witch?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Sorry, I didn't see anybody.
But thanks for the cat!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_020_0.text:
Well, crud. Guess this is what folks
mean when they say you're bewitched.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
Oh, she's got something in her mouth!
What did you find there, kitty?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text: Looks like a sarubobo doll— and a real old one, at that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
It looks just like the little doll you have
on your bag. Is it, like, one of Miyako City's
traditional crafts or something?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text: Well, I got this one here as a gift— and I bet this one we just found was brought here from outside Miyako City a long, long time ago. Limestone caves... An old sarubobo doll... Yeah, no, I'm overthinkin' this here. I just gotta be!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
See, a long time ago, there was a fella
around here folks called 'the Lifetaker,'
and I'm pretty sure he came from the place
most closely associated with these dolls. Oh, and folks also claim the Lifetaker's
old sword is hidin' somewhere in the
depths of these limestone caves.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
So he was, like, a murderer?
Brrr! That's creepy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text: Oh yeah, guy was a real big-deal assassin. Anyway, I was thinking it might be related, but now I'm pretty sure it's not. So since I don't know who this sarubobo belongs to, I suppose you can take it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
Yeah, I guess—but if I find the owner,
I'll be sure to give it back to them.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_0.text:
In that case, let's swing on outta here.
Oh, and since I've been with you this far,
I'll go ahead and walk you home.
Oh, I'm Asahi Sayota, by the way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_1.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_030_1.text:
I'm Yumeha Izumi—I live over there.
Thanks so much, Asahi!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text:
I see your mana collection
is proceeding smoothly.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text: What's the matter, Ameya? You've been staring a hole in that poor sarubobo doll.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text:
That's 'cause I feel a sort of strange
power coming from it—something
that's a bit different from magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text:
In that case, it might be dangerous.
Let me see it, if you would.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text:
Mmm. I feel echoes of a power,
yes, but it's terribly faint.
I doubt it will affect you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_010_CUT_040_0.text:
Well, if my LoLo says it's safe, then it definitely is!
Guess I'll just hang onto it until I find the owner.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.text:
Yeah, but they learned a lot of interesting
stuff about the guy recently. Apparently the
folks he killed were real bad, and there was
also a little girl who worked with him. So even though the guy was a killer,
he sounds pretty swell in his own way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.text: Do you think this sarubobo belonged to the girl?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_0.text: I remember something about how sarubobo used to be given to girls as presents, so I suppose this Lifetaker fella could've done that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.text:
Well, I want to give it back to her!
Although if she lived back when the
Lifetaker did, I guess she'd be long
dead. I wonder if she has a grave...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.text:
Wouldn't know anything about that,
but folks say that after he came to Miyako City,
the Lifetaker used to stay in what's now the old
abandoned village.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.text:
Then let's go there right now!
Maybe her grave is—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_020_CUT_030_1.text:
No can do, kiddo! That place isn't safe.
So look, I'll take you there, but we only
go as far as the entrance, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text: Hey, so this is the abandoned village folks say the Lifetaker used to hang around. I can't let you go in, but you can just leave the sarubobo right here at the entrance.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text:
I get why you don't want to go in,
but I still feel bad I can't give it
to the little girl directly.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text:
Thank you, young miss.
She loved that little doll.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text:
Worry not. I will do you no harm.
For while I sense a strange power
about you, you are not of the fae.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text:
Fae? Wait, so you were killing
people that weren't human?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text:
The only ones who could see the creatures
were myself and her. No one believed us,
much less... Ah, but I won't bore you
with the particulars.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_0.text: Please take the sarubobo and keep it near you always. And...thank you for placing your trust in us.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.text: It's...nothing. Please don't worry about it. But you know what? I think I'm going to take this sarubobo and give it a good home.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.text:
Hey, you do you. But if that's the
case, we oughta be headin' back. Oh, and since I've been with you this far,
I'll just go ahead and walk you home.
I'm Asahi Sayota, by the way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_000_1.text:
I'm Yumeha Izumi—I live over there.
Thanks so much, Asahi!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.text:
I'm glad I got some mana out of that,
but the Lifetaker's story was so sad! He could see spirits, but no one believed him.
The little girl who traveled with him was the
only one who understood him in the end.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.text:
I see that while rare, those with special
powers are sometimes born into this world.
Though it is not exactly magic, mmm?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.text: Yeah, I guess maybe the little tingles I'm getting from this sarubobo are echoes of the girl's power.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.text:
Also, that Asahi boy was quite impressive despite
his lack of power! The way he leapt into danger
without hesitation for your sake? He'd make a
fine squire had he only been born in Pulchra.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HITOKIRI_030_CUT_010_0.text:
Yeah, I don't know—he doesn't seem like
the type to serve under other people.
But he sure was a huge help!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
You see the news there this morning?
Folks say that pollen's gonna be a
real humdinger today, and apparently
it just cropped up outta nowhere.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Guess that explains why my eyes
were real itchy when I woke up.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Cripes, don't scare me like that!
You okay there, Kentaro?
That's the kind of sneeze that'll
blow your nose clear off your face.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I thought pollen season was over,
but I'm suffering something fierce
over here...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Aw, poor thing! And you're supposed to
be studying for your entrance exams, too.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, I can't stand anyone who has the gall
to bother Kentaro while he's supposed to be
studying, so I'm gonna go find 'em!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_080.text:
It's real weird to have pollen springin' up
out of nowhere at this time of year, yeah?
I think somebody's plotting something.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_100.text:
All right, here's the deal! After school,
we're gonna find the Pollen Prince!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Huh? Who? What in the heck?
Ren, I got no idea what you're going on
about here. Who's the Pollen Prince?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Well, near as I can tell, there's gotta
be some baddie making all this pollen,
and I'm gonna go find him!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Not sure a fella like that actually exists,
but I can tell there's no point in arguing
about it. I heard on the news that the
pollen's coming from northeast of the city.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_140.text:
It's not just a 'fella,' Kentaro—it's the
Pollen Prince! Still, there's only one place
around here that could produce so much
pollen, so that's where we're headed. Now since Kentaro and Haruna are
feeling low, they'll just stay put here.
Yumeha! Yuzuki! You're with me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_000_CUT_000_150.text: Why do I gotta go with you!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, so are we really going
into the forest here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_010.text:
You betcha! The pollen's getting worse,
which is proof the Prince is nearby.
Plus you wanna help Haruna, right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Sure I do—but what does this
Pollen Prince even want?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Just listening to these two,
you'd think there's really some
kind of fiend up ahead.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_080.text:
Wow, Ren's instincts are sharp—
there WAS a fiend here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
