SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_090.text:
And since both of them ran off without me,
this is the perfect chance to transform.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_100.text: Time to show them what magic can do!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_120.text:
Oh hey, you came! The witch lady came!
Hey, Yuzuki! Come look at this!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_140.text:
I guess this will be my first time
showing you what a witch can do,
eh, Yuzuki? Well, get ready...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_150.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_000_150.text:
Hear me, O Pollen Prince!
See now the true strength of a
witch as I slay you...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_000.text:
The Pollen Prince is dead!
Now there won't be anymo...anymo... WAAAAAA-CHOOOOOO!
Uuugh. My eyes itch.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Can't believe that thing let off so much pollen
at the end! I'm not even allergic and my nose
is still itching like all get-out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_020.text:
But looks like the pollen's clearing up.
What was that power there, lady?
And who are you, anyway?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_030.text:
I am Ameya the Witch,
and that power...was MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_040.text:
Wait, so witches actually exist?
Nah. No way that's true.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_050.text: I mean, she's right in front of you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_070.text:
Sure I do! Heck, the lady's shown
me a whole buncha spells by now.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_080.text: Now run along home, you two.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, wait! We had another girl with us.
Did you see her, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Yes, I saw her on the way here—she seemed to
be looking for you, so I bet you'll see her soon.
But I'll holler if I spot her, okay?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_110.text:
So you've seen that
lady before, Ren?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_120.text:
Heck, plenty of times! Whenever I get in
trouble, she pops up outta nowhere and
solves all my problems with magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_130.text:
Which means you keep getting
yourself into trouble.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Guys, why'd you run off without me!?
All these dumb trees look the same
and I had no idea where I was!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_160.text:
Sorry, Izumi. Er, but did you see
the witch lady pass by, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_170.text: Nope. I did find a cat, though!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_010_180.text:
Well, somebody seems pretty
calm about all this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Yuzuki is friends with Haruna, so I was a
little worried she wouldn't believe in magic,
but she actually accepted it pretty quickly.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Perhaps she happened to be stuck with exactly
the right person in that scenario; as of now,
you have saved his life with your magic more 
than any of the others.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Honestly, all he ever does is find ways
to get himself into trouble. I almost wish
he'd take a page from Kentaro's book...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_030.text:
You always seem so happy when you talk
about your classmates—especially of late.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_HAY_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Yeah, I guess I've been warming up to them.
But don't worry! I'm still super focused
on the Witchterms, so don't lecture me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well done on the choir competition today,
everyone. And Kotoha, thank you for the
lovely piano accompaniment. We'll be going
back to school now, so please follow me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_010.text: Holy cripes! Akane? Is that you!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Ranko!? Heck, I haven't seen you since
music school! Do you work here or
something, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure do! I wanted a job that involved music,
even if I only worked reception. But hey,
you're a full-blown music teacher, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh geez, no. I'm just a normal elementary
teacher. Nothing to do with music, really.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Gosh, what a waste! I'm sure folks
would learn to love music if they
heard you play the piano.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You play piano, Ms. Erisawa!?
Heck, I wanna hear!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
You really not performed
for anyone since then?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Okay, that's enough of the past, Ranko;
I'm real happy with my work right now.
Speaking of, I'm in the middle of it,
so I better skedaddle.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Wait! We got an open hall right now—
piano's set up on stage and everything.
If these kiddos wanna hear you play,
you oughta give 'em the chance.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_120.text:
I didn't agree to none of this, Ranko!
We need to hurry back to school.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Who wants to hear Ms. Erisawa
play the piano, eh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I can't wait to hear her play, Yumeha!
...Yumeha? Hey, where'd she go?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I forgot how pushy you could be, Ranko.
You know I was never much for playing in
front of folks, and now all the kids are
gonna laugh me out of the room. I mean, what happened to YOU, anyway?
Didn't you want to be a vocalist?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Well then, since it's not fair for me to make a
dang fool of myself alone, let's play together.
We'll do an aria—you always were real good
at those, remember?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Hey now, hold on just a second there!
I don't have any sheet music, so I can't...
Maybe we should just call this off.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Greetings! I am Ameya the Witch,
and I can make all of your wishes
come true...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_210.text:
...Did you just claim to be a witch?
The heck you talking about?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_220.text:
I can't believe we're in Andrew Hall...
Our dreams really ARE coming true!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_230.text: I can do this if you can, Ranko.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_260.text:
They're so amazing... *sniff*
Aw heck, here come the waterworks!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_270.text:
These two are incredible even without my magic.
I mean, I'm good and all, but I'm not THIS good.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_280.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_280.text:
Thanks a bunch, Ranko. It's been a long time
since I got to concentrate on a performance
like that, and I'm real happy with the way
everything turned out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_290.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_290.text:
That goes double for me. That's the first time
I've ever been so happy with how I sounded.
So I'm not gonna give up on my dreams,
Akane—and it's all thanks to you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_300.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_300.text:
Just be sure to thank all the little
witches and wizards who cast the
spell on you, all right? Byeee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_310.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_310.text:
Heck, she's right: we gotta thank the kiddos!
You got a real swell audience here, Akane,
and I hope you keep playing for 'em.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_320.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_320.text:
I think I will. I mean, I'd locked that part
of me away without really thinkin' about it,
but then you came along and forced it open.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_330.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_330.text:
It feels like a fire's been lit in me,
so if I ever get the chance to sing again,
I'm gonna take it and run with it!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_340.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_340.text:
Aw, Kotoha! Are you crying? 
I guess Ms. Erisawa and her friend
were even better than I thought.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_360.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_360.text:
Sorry! I saw a cat and had to chase it
'cause they're not allowed in here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_370.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_370.text:
Shucks, look at the time! We gotta get back
to school or we're gonna miss the bell!
Let's catch up soon, okay, Ranko?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_380.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_000_380.text: Come, children! Form a neat line! Now we're going back to school!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
You've gathered quite a bit of mana,
yet you seem troubled all the same.
What's on your mind, Ameya?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't get why there aren't any witches
in this world when it's so rich with magic.
And on the flip side, why are witches even
born in Pulchra in the first place?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_020.text: I'm certain witches are born into this world, though it's likely a most infrequent occurrence. But because no one raises them to be witches, their power never manifests.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Yeah, I guess that makes sense. Pulchra is
already full of witches, so anybody born with
magic power gets trained to become one.
...Kinda deep, don't you think?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Speaking of, you need to finish your
Witchterms so you might also grow
into the role of an exemplary witch.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_AKANE_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Now THAT I can get behind, LoLo!
I'm gonna work hard and collect
all the mana I can find!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Hmm... Looks like the green line
leads to the university again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey there. Something the matter?
You looking for someone?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm actually looking for my cat.
Have you seen her?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
That's funny! Asahi told me about an elementary
student who was looking for a cat at the limestone
caves. I guess cat searches must just be the
new 'in' thing for kids lately, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, that was me! I'm Yumeha Izumi,
and Asahi helped me find my cat.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text: Er, and your cat's run off again?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ha ha! Yeah, she's a real free spirit.
So are you Asahi's friend?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Well... Sure, I suppose I am. He actually
invited me out to the abandoned village
to see 'a tree that's moving around,' but
I figured he was just making things up. And even if he isn't, I have to work,
so I told him no.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Moving trees!? Wowzers!
That sounds interesting.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, it shouldn't, because trees don't move.
Also, I don't want you going out to that
abandoned village by yourself, because who
knows what shady people are lurking about?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, I hope you find your cat,
Yumeha Izumi. Er, again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
Well, looks like the green line is taking
me to the abandoned village anyway.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
The trees are thick and dense...
The buildings have fallen apart...
Yeah, it's uncanny in here, all right.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
Hey, are you all right?
What happened?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text: Oh hey, you're the lady from... Gosh, so you really do exist! That girl said she didn't see you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
Who cares about that right now?
What happened to you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text: That tree moved—I think it's actually a monster or something! Dang thing barely poked me, and look how I ended up; you need to hurry on outta this place while you still can.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
I'm not going anywhere. I'm a witch,
so I'm going to burn it...WITH MAGIC!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
Huh!? Cripes, no! Don't use fire or you'll
burn the whole forest down!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
K-kidding! Ha ha! Just a little
joke to lighten the mood.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_000.text:
Look at that thing, sauntering around
without a care in the world...
Leave this to me, friend.
You just find a place to hide!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Gosh, Witch Lady.
You're real strong.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Say, there was a girl looking for a cat
outside the village. You should probably
take this over to her.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Aw, c'mon! I have to
take the cat again?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
You do. Now go! Hurry!
Before she wanders in here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Oh, it's my kitty! ...Er, Asahi?
What are you doing here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
YOU'RE the kid looking for the cat?
Well, I found her for ya. Again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Oh, thank you so much! ...Huh? Oh no!
You're hurt! That lady at the university
was right to be worried about you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_010.text:
Eh, I'm fine—though I should probably
go get checked out just in case, yeah?
Now you go straight home, Yumeha.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
Wow, I've collected so much mana...
I'm totally on track to get a perfect score
on my Witchterms, don't you think!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
Still, I wonder if Asahi likes that supernatural
stuff Ren was talking about. I mean, he went all
the way out there to look at a walking tree,
which is definitely not a hot date night.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
Curiosity for the unknown is part of a
creature's survival instincts—but too much
curiosity can, as they say, kill the cat.
Hiss! Such a terrible saying... And while dating a romantic interest is also
part of most creatures' survival instincts,
I doubt this Asahi needs to worry about
his genes living on into posterity.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
Man, LoLo. Ouch.
You tell it like it is.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
Pick your partner well, Ameya, for part
of your duty as a witch is to bring more
fine examples of your kind into the world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MOVINGTREE_010_CUT_020.text:
I'm kind of in the middle of my Witchterms
right now, LoLo, so let's save the talk about
my future children for later, 'kay?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Wow, there's a big crowd at the park.
I wonder what everyone's looking at.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Some critter no one's ever seen is
having a staredown with a cat over
the jizo statue's offerings. Nothing good'll come of it if you
get caught in the middle, kiddo,
so best steer clear.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_02.text:
It appears the cat reached for the offering
first, Lady Ameya. This insult angered the
fiends to either side of the jizo statue.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_03.text:
All creatures are scary when it comes to food, huh?
Still, if we give them the offering and apologize,
then that should calm them down enough for us
to get the cat back. We'll just have to make sure to
treat the statues with respect.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_04.text:
We have yet another option: If you manage
to subjugate the fiends, they will return
to their original statuesque form. This will also attract an audience
and help you in your search for mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_05.text:
So I can either put on a show
or resolve this peacefully?
Hmm... What should I do...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I am in the middle of my Witchterms,
after all—I should keep that in mind.
Gotta take every opportunity I can get.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_10.text:
I thought you might choose this path,
and have already prepared an offering.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hello, Mr. Statue. I see my naughty cat
ate your offering, and I'm so, SO sorry!
Will you please forgive my kitty if
I give you a new offering?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Phew! Looks like that worked. And as for you, kitty, don't go around
eating things that don't belong to you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Everything will be well now, people!
I, Ameya the Witch, have defeated the
fell entities that came to reside in
your precious statues...WITH MAGIC! Oh, and the cat's safe, too.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_00.text:
So they all thought it was some kind of
performance? Man, the people in this world
don't believe in magic at ALL.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_01.text:
Ah, but I did see some elderly people with
their hands clasped together in prayer‚
and I believe their thoughts made a proper
conversion to mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_020_02.text:
Really? That's great! I guess word of
the wise and beautiful witch Ameya
is really getting around!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I wonder if I should've put on a show to get
the mana instead. But at the same time, I don't
want to harm things that belong to this world,
and they all seem to love those jizo statues.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_01.text:
As it was your decision, I would say all is well.
Also, there was a chance the statue would not
have accepted your apology, which put you in
no small amount of danger while making it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_02.text:
Wow, I hadn't even thought that far...
You're always worrying about me, LoLo.
I love you so much.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_03.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_KOMAINU_000_CUT_030_03.text:
If my dedication to you is not going
unnoticed, then all is well. I'm the
best friend a witch could hope for.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Hey there, Izumi! Swell timing!
Go drop your books and stuff at home
and come meet the rest of us at the
river next to the hotel, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Ren's gonna introduce
us to his pet.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, that weird pet you claim to have?
Why isn't it at your house?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_04.text:
'Cause my house doesn't have a
huge aquarium in it! See ya soon!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Is it really that big, do you think?
I'm kinda scared. Aren't you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm actually more curious—
especially since Ren is so into it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Yeah, okay. Well, guess I'll get going.
See you at the river!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_08.text: Will you go to the river, milady?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Why do you keep showing up
out of the blue like this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_10.text:
I have modeled myself off the ninja,
a sneaky being native to this world. That said, I urge you to be careful
if you go. Remember what happened
with the frog last time?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Aw, I'm not worried! If something happens,
I'll just save them with my magic again!
I'd even get a bunch of mana that way.
So see? You worry too much!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_12.text:
...If possible, this is one tool I hope
we can go without using.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_14.text:
So you were here all along, familiar.
I am prepared for whatever may come,
for this is also the job of a squire.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_000_CUT_000_15.text:
I can't say it seems like you are.
Quickly now. Cease this standing
about and get after her.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, folks! I'm gonna call 'im over.
C'mon out, bud! We're here to play!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, that's way too big to be a seahorse.
Also, we aren't even AT the sea!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I told you he was weird, right?
...What's wrong there, Kentaro?
Seahorse got your tongue, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Whoa, hey! What's the big idea!?
Aw, dang it! I twisted my ankle!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_06.text:
Ren, are you okay!?
Yumeha, what do we do!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_07.text:
The fiend's poised to attack. If I leave now
to transform, they're going to get hurt.
But if they see me for who I really am...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_08.text:
Choose what you feel is most appropriate,
Lady Ameya. Also, if worse comes to worst,
I can take care of it—though I fear this will
come at the cost of some mana.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_09.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_09.text: It's worth mana to save them!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_10.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_10.text: Sorry, guys! I need my mana!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_11.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_11.text: No! I won't let you hurt them!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_15.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_15.text:
I'm going to get help!
Stay right there!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_16.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_16.text:
No! Stay back! Aw heck,
somebody help meee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_17.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_000_17.text:
Get away from them, fiend!
You face Ameya the Witch now!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_00.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_00.text:
Now, Lady Ameya, I will be requiring a bit
of mana. Memory manipulation uses only
the bare minimum, so what you collected
this time should more than suffice.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Aw, nuts! We came all the way out here
to say hi, but he's not here anymore!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_04.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_04.text:
It was still incredible, though!
I've never seen a seahorse that big.
Isn't that right, Yumeha?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Hmm? Oh, uh, yeah.
It was cool, all right.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_06.text:
What's wrong? Seahorse got your— OW!
Huh? When the hey did I twist my ankle?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_08.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_08.text:
Nah, I'll be fine. Don't go making
mountains out of molehills, guy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_09.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_09.text:
You should still go get looked at.
You might be hurt in other ways
and just not know it yet.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_10.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_10.text:
Well, heck. If you both say so, I guess
I should. Don't really wanna talk to my
parents about this, but...fine.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_11.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_010_11.text:
You should definitely tell them. Oh, hey! A kitty! Sure is nice to see 
one'a these instead of a giant seahorse.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_00.text:
I really didn't want to mess around
with their memories, LoLo. I mean,
they're my FRIENDS!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_01.text:
But you did so to save their lives,
which means you made the right decision.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_015_02.text:
I didn't even get any mana, either.
This whole day has been a huge bummer.
I'm just gonna go to bed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_01.text:
I'm glad neither of you are hurt.
That isn't a pet—it's a fiend.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_02.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_02.text:
A fiend? Heck, how'd a thing like that
get into Miyako City? Also, how'd you
know I thought it was my—

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_03.text:
Oh, uh... A girl who came to ask my help!
She said your pet was running wild,
so I told her to stay in a safe place. I'll go get her, and then I want the
three of you to go straight home.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_04.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_04.text:
...Fiends in Miyako?
The heck does that mean?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_05.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_05.text:
Eh, I bet 'fiend' is an exaggeration.
I mean, folks say there used to be mystical
creatures and stuff in Miyako City, yeah?
This is probably just something like that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_06.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_06.text:
Mystical creatures don't sound like a good
time to me! I hope they're at least something
harmless... Like talking pumpkins.
I could deal with talking pumpkins.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_08.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_08.text:
Yeah no, I'm totally— YEOWCH!
I mean, uh, I twisted my ankle.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_09.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_09.text:
You should have a doctor
look at that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_11.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_11.text:
Mountains out of molehills, the both of you!
But if you insist, I guess I'll go. Sure wish I didn't
have to tell my parents about this though...

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_12.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_12.text: You should definitely tell them. Oh hey, Yumeha! What's with the cat?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_13.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_13.text:
It walked up when I was hiding!
Its purrs helped to calm me down.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_14.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_020_14.text:
Yeah, cats sure are nicer
than some giant seahorse!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_00.text: Did I make the right choice, LoLo?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_01.text:
Of course. You collected your mana and
still managed to keep the boys safe.
I would call that a smashing success.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_02.text:
But if I'd been a moment later, Ren and
Kentaro both could've gotten really hurt!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_03.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_03.text:
This entire world is naught but a stage
for your Witchterms, Ameya—and as a witch
of Pulchra, you made the right decision.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_04.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MYSTERY_010_CUT_025_04.text:
...Yeah, I guess you're right.
Thanks, LoLo.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for inviting me out
to Sequoia Mall, Haruna!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Heard you'd never been here before, so Yuzuki
said I should invite you. Still, I didn't think
you'd be the first one here. I mean, heck,
you're barely ever on time for school.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Excuse me, ladies, but could I possibly impose
on you to lend a hand? I believe there is
someone in here seeking aid.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Who're you? Also, by 'here,'
are you talking about the mirror?
'Cause that makes no sense.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, I get it. This is like a carnival
or something, yeah? Sorry, but
I'm not really into kiddie games.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_050.text: Indeed, someone so noble as you would not easily lend your power to another. And yet, I need you for this! Your power is most special indeed, and you are the only one who can help.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I'm not sure this is some sort of carnival.
Also, I feel like I've seen this guy before—
and I sense some kind of power from him.
But then why is he asking Haruna and not me?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'll take the compliment about being noble,
but a special power? You're not saying
I can use magic or something, right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I am saying precisely that, girl!
How grand that you finally noticed! Now use your magical power to free the one
I hold dear from this mirror—for alas,
I cannot physically smash it myself.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Go on. Touch it. Your power is strong enough
to shatter this unbreakable mirror into pieces.
Believe in your magic and save the one who is
precious to me. I beg this of you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_100.text:
That man just did something to the mirror!
This might be bad news!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I bet you did something to this mirror
that'll make it seem like it broke.
Pretty lousy trick for an old fella to pull,
but I guess I'll play along.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Fear not! Ameya the Witch 
will protect you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_010_000.text:
It's too dangerous for this thing to
remain broken. Let's fix it with magic.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_010_CUT_000_000.text: Let's try to fix the mirror again!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_000.text:
You gotta be heckin' kidding me...
Magic actually exists? What WAS that?
And did the mirror break because of me?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_010.text:
No, the man who tricked you broke it.
You didn't do anything wrong.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_020.text:
But you're a witch, right!? So doesn't
that mean you're gonna seal me away
inside the mirror!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Not all witches are evil! Sheesh!
Also, an evil witch wouldn't have
protected a school kid from fiends
in the first place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_050.text:
Well, crud. It looks like she might believe
in magic now, but the idea of it doesn't
thrill her at all. I've gotta change her mind.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_060.text:
Okay, look. Some types of magic can be
scary depending on how you use them,
but I used mine to protect you. So if you focus on using yours to protect
other people, it won't be scary at all!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_080.text:
The man did say one good thing:
believe in your magic. Anyway, I gotta go, so byeee!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_090.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_090.text:
Believe in magic... Wait, how did that
witch know we had that conversation?

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_100.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_100.text:
...Oh! I bet she used her magic to
watch us! Man, that is SO cool!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_110.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_110.text:
Er, there's something down
at your feet, Yumeha.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_130.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_030_130.text:
Gotta admit, I feel like I'm losing my marbles
whenever I'm around you. Yuzuki needs to
hurry the heck up and get here already.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_000.text:
I did it! I finally got Haruna
to appreciate magic!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_010.text:
It's just as I said—the moment you shattered
her conception that witches don't exist,
it became a powerful aspiration for her.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_020.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_020.text:
Yeah, you were right. But I worked hard,
and I think you should compliment me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_030.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_030.text:
What a handful you are! ...Oh, fine. You did well, Ameya.
There's a good girl.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_040.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_MIRROR_000_CUT_040_040.text:
Okay, but maybe don't
do it like I'm a kid!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.text:
How much mana have I
collected anyway, LoLo?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.text:
You're about halfway
to passing marks.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_MANA_HALF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Man, I thought I'd done a lot so far,
but I still have a long way to go.
Just gotta keep working hard, I guess!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
It seems you've collected enough
mana to return to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
So my Witchterms are over? I passed?
I can become a full-fledged witch!?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
They are indeed over, and you have
likely passed—which means you will
officially become a witch.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
You will require the approval of the
Congress of Sages, but that should be
a mere formality. You did well, Ameya.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, LoLo's complimenting me?
I must be dreaming!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
And now it's time for us to say goodbye
to Miyako City. Your support will be taking
care of the rest, so all you need think of
is returning the Crystal Cage to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
It's just like when I came, huh?
I appear out of nowhere and then
I vanish right back into it.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Such is what it means
to be a witch.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.text:
Well, heck. Izumi's late.
What's she up to, you think?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.text:
Hello, children. Due to work-related reasons,
Yumeha and her family have gone back east.
I know this is sudden, but they only just
contacted the school to let us know.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_01.text:
C'mon, Kentaro! Soon as school's out,
we're gonna swing by her house.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
They're already gone...
We must've missed 'em.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
Oh, wait! Got a letter here from Yumeha!
Says 'Dear Classmates' on the front.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
'My dear friends. We had to move very suddenly,
which means I'm leaving without saying goodbye.
I'm sad for a whole bunch of reasons, but I can't
tell you all of them because we have to go.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
Just know this: I will never,
ever forget any of you.
Thank you for everything.
—Yumeha.'

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
THIS is her sorry excuse for a letter?
Cripes, Yumeha! Do better! Don't they
teach kids manners where she's from?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
Are you kiddin' me here, Izumi!? Ugh!
C'mon, Kentaro. Let's go.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
Why are you mad, Ren? I'm sad.
I wanna cry like everyone else.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
I'm sorry, Ren. I'm sorry, Kotoha.
I'm sorry Yuzuki and Haruna and Kentaro.
...Thank you. Thank you all.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
I know. But I guess this is all
part of the Witchterms, huh?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
As we gain one thing, we lose another.
But if you take any lesson from your
experience, make it this: to lose
something is not always a bad thing.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
...I haven't lost anything, LoLo. I won't ever
forget Miyako City or the friends I made here.
They're going to be with me for life.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_60PT_000_CUT_02.text:
Let's go home, Ameya.
Let's return to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Given all this mana you collected,
you can return to Pulchra with pride.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, does that mean I passed?
Oh my gosh, my Witchterms are over!
I can finally go back to Pulchra
and be a full-fledged witch!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
You will require the approval of the
Congress of Sages, but that should be
a mere formality at this point.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Yesss! I worked sooo hard!
Good job, me! You were awesome!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
I see you've given yourself so much praise
that mine will not be required.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
No, LoLo! Praise me! Praise me a BUNCH!
Because this definitely isn't enough
to warm my heart.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
You seem delighted, Ameya. Did you truly feel
so much pressure to pass? Even I, your familiar,
thought you seemed to be your usual self
through the entire process.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, LoLo, I've never felt so FREE!
I don't have to see Mom be disappointed,
and I get to go brag to everyone else!
This is the BEST! WOOOOOO!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.text:
Wait, but can I really become a witch
like this? I mean, my magic still
isn't complete.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.text:
Your test was to see how much mana you could
collect—and despite your circumstances,
you accomplished that goal with fine marks. I can imagine no reason why the
Congress of Sages would not formally
acknowledge you as a witch.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.text:
Aw, thanks, LoLo. I can tell you're
trying to make me feel better.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.text:
Your magic will continue to grow, so there
is no need to obsess over what has been lost.
Now let us return to Pulchra, and quickly!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_80PT_010_CUT_00.text:
And that means you can collect a little
more mana as well. Now get out there and
give the sages a real shock, Ameya!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
You did it, Ameya! The Crystal Cage
is completely filled with mana.
I have never seen such a thing
in all my years...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Am I really that amazing, LoLo?
Super gifted AND talented?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Let's not get carried away, Ameya.
Now then, how much of your magic
have you recovered?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
All of it! Now I can go back to Pulchra
with full peace of mind—those sages
aren't gonna know what hit 'em!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Goodness, but this IS a level of perfection you
usually never achieve. I'm actually starting to 
get nervous that something might go wrong... Yes, well. Either way,
let us return to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_010_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh, uh, not all of it!
Ha ha haaaaaa... Ha?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_010_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, perfection never has been your
thing, Ameya, which I believe is fine.
Now let's go home.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.text:
LoLo! I got all my magic back!
We can return to Pulchra whenever.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, I suppose the Crystal Cage is full
enough—though it's a bit unfortunate you
didn't manage to fill it all the way.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, but it'd be weird if everything
went perfectly! This feels just right.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_020_CUT_0.text:
Nothing more Ameya-like has ever been spoken.
As such, we will leave it at that and make our way
back to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.text:
I guess I don't have a reason to stay
in Miyako City anymore then, huh?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.text:
The time has come for you to return to Pulchra.
Oh, but the sages will be shocked indeed,
for no apprentice witch has ever gotten
such a score on their Witchterms!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.text:
What is the matter, Ameya?
Do you feel ill?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_030_CUT_0.text:
...I'm fine. It's nothing.
I need to get ready to go.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yuzuki_Nakatu
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
So we're all gonna be in different
places once we graduate, eh?
Sorta makes me sad to think about.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Don't forget me... Okay?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Haruna_Kaneto
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
How the heck COULD we forget the
weirdest transfer student we ever got?
I mean, you were so... *sniff*

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Kotoha_Shimoya
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Aw, don't start crying there!
You're going to make me cry too!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Talk about overreacting...
We're just going off to middle school,
you big dummies!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, but Yumeha's going back east.
Did you not know?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: WHAT!? No one told me that!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Izumi! Are you really leaving!?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Yeah, I am. So this is goodbye.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: I wish I could stay here, but...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Well then, give it here.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Sorry, give what?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Your hand! We're gonna finish this
deal off right with a handshake.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
You do well back where you came from, Izumi.
Go be the witch you always wanted to be.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Aw, thanks, Ren...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
But what? If you want to stay,
then stay.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: I... Look, it's REALLY complicated.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Yumeha Izumi! Yumeha Izumi!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
You are Yumeha Izumi, yes? I am from your father's
company. We received the results of your entrance
exam, and you passed. You do not need to be apart
from your family, and you may continue attending
school here in Miyako City this April.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Wait, I can stay here? Really!?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
I will take care of all the arrangements.
You have nothing to worry about.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
What school are you going to, Yumeha?
Rakugaku!? You're amazing!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, bud, I didn't know you were a rich girl!
You really had me fooled by saying all that
junk about wanting to be a witch.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, but I have no idea what this school
is going to be like, so... Hey! Ren!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Do you think Ren realized what I was?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
It's difficult to say. But what I can
say for certain is that the boy very
much believed in your dreams.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
And that's enough to give me strength.
I'm going to be the witch I always wanted
to be, and I'm going to protect Pulchra
from the Calamity!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Such a mindset is important, Ameya.
Now let's return to Pulchra.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you angry with
my decision, LoLo?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
A familiar does not question the decisions
of his mistress, Ameya—and you will not be
the first witch to decide to remain in the
world to which she was sent.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
I guess that's just another part
of the Witchterms, right?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Precisely so. However, you must understand that
remaining in Miyako City means giving up your
witch-hood. Do you truly comprehend this?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah. I think so. My powers will slowly disappear,
I'll eventually be unable to use magic, and then
I'll become just a regular old resident here.
Er, that's how it's gonna go, right?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: And you will also say goodbye to me.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: What!? No!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
I am a witch's familiar; I cannot remain with
someone who is not a witch. Instead, I will
return to Pulchra to find a new mistress.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, I'm such an IDIOT! I never thought about
losing YOU, LoLo! All I thought about was
staying in Miyako City! I never considered
what it might mean for you and me!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
As we gain one thing, we lose another. Or perhaps I should
say that when we lose something, we gain another thing in
its place. You will lose me, but many wonderful relationships
wait for you here. So go. Find your happiness.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
No, LoLo! I don't want this!
I don't want to lose you!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Meow...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: LoLo! LoLo, no! LoLo...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Welp, I'm off to school!

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mother_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe she starts high school
today... Time certainly does fly.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: It is all because of your hard work.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mother_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh! Hello, LoLo! You're a face I've not seen
in quite some time. Have you come to check
on Amey... I mean, Yumeha?

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
You think a familiar has the power to make such selfish
decisions? No, I'm here on yet another Witchterm—and
I fully intend to bring this one back to Pulchra! Is Miyako
City truly so attractive? I simply cannot fathom it...

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mother_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, I don't know. There's a certain charm
to this city and its people—and to this
entire world, in fact.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I'm no witch, so I suppose I will
never understand. Either way, I'm glad
to see her doing well.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mother_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text:
Come back and visit anytime,
my dear familiar LoLo.

SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_FUNC_AMYA_ENDING_100PT_000_CUT_0.text: Mornin', everybody!

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_URGE_EQUIPMENT_000_CUT.speaker: UI
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_URGE_EQUIPMENT_000_CUT.text:
Some magical cats transform into spells when collected.
Be sure to set your reclaimed spell so you can make use of it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_URGE_EQUIPMENT_000_CUT.speaker: UI
SUB_W01_EVAR_AMYA_URGE_EQUIPMENT_000_CUT.text:
Some magical cats transform into armaments when collected.
Should that happen, don't forget to equip whatever you get.
